description: Rakka is very ill after her forest adventure; Reki can do nothing but wait, remembering the time when Kuramori took care of her. When Rakka`s fever doesn`t go down, Reki chases to the temple, receiving answers to questions she didn`t even ask. Even the Haibane of the Abandoned Factory care about the "girl with the weird hair", and Midori delivers Hyouko`s present. Finally Rakka is ordered to the temple to receive her punishment for touching the wall.

titles.title: Kanamori - Haibane de l`usine - Travail de Rakka
Kuramori - Haikoujou no Haibane-tachi - Rakka no Shigoto
Kuramori / Die Haibane aus der Fabrik / Rakkas Arbeit
Kuramori / Haibane of Abandoned Factory / Rakka`s Job
Kuramori; Haibane z opuszczonej fabryki; Praca Rakki
Курамори — Серокрылые с заброшенной фабрики — Работа Ракки
クラモリ・廃工場の灰羽達・ラッカの仕事
